name: Maker
description: A templating library for my Python libraries. I have not used it heavily yet, but I will continue building with it.

name: Laundry Notes
description: A highly customized Markdown-to-HTML workflow that supports a custom template and custom CSS file per run.

name: Paper DB
description: A CLI utility that converts Google Sheets by sheet ID into Markdown in an Obsidian-style format.

name: Picocrat
description: A tiny PyTorch-focused library that I experimented with.

name: Nano CTM
description: A work-in-progress nanoGPT-style repository to distill Continuous Thought Machines into a modular library people can extend with their own components.
